      Add a new HTTP header that will be sent with this request.

      Add a new HTTP route parameter that will be sent with this request.
      static GeneralRequest GeneralRequest.delete(String url, String body)
      Construct an HTTP request, using the DELETE method, to be sent on the specified URL and with the specified content body.
      static GeneralRequest GeneralRequest.get(String url)
      Construct an HTTP request, using the GET method, to be sent on the specified URL.
      static GeneralRequest GeneralRequest.patch(String url, String body)
      Construct an HTTP request, using the PATCH method, to be sent on the specified URL and with the specified content body.

      Construct an HTTP request, using the POST method, to be sent on the specified URL and with the specified content body.

      Construct an HTTP request, using the PUT method, to be sent on the specified URL and with the specified content body.
      GeneralRequest GeneralRequest.setBody(String body)
      Sets the body content that will be sent by this request.
      GeneralRequest GeneralRequest.setContentType(org.apache.http.entity.ContentType contentType)
      Set the content-type that will be used for this request.
      GeneralRequest GeneralRequest.setTimeout(long timeout)
      Sets the timeout, in milliseconds, that will cause the test to fail if no response response is received within the specified timeout.
      static GeneralRequest GeneralRequest.withMethod(HttpMethod method, String url, String body)
      Construct an HTTP request, using the specified HTTP method, to be sent on the specified URL and with the specified content body.
